name: Skyroad AI Game
description:
Dominate the smart AI on this survival  SkyRoad race.

Game rules :

n°1: Run and never stop.

n°2: Don't touch obstacles, walls or you might explode. 

control : gamepad, arrows key or WASD, shift or L2 to run .mouse or right stick for camera. space to jump. MOBILE  :use  buttons on screen. 

Features : 

- smart AI

- controls for all devices.

- Juicy:   particles effects , camera shake, multi camera blending...

-smooth control.
